caption.title: A comparative analysis of the groups involved with phases one and two, and phase three (the workshop).

tr.td: 13 countries (UK, US, Canada, Australia, Germany, Croatia, Thailand, France, Chile, Peru, Switzerland, Malaysia, Zambia and Pakistan)
10 countries (UK, US, Canada, Australia, Germany, Croatia, Thailand, France, Chile, Switzerland and Pakistan)
15 participants from humanities and social sciences (39%) and 23 from natural sciences (61%)
